amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 17304, relating to oil and gas lease sales in the Southern California planning area, and part 4, relating to OCS revenue sharing with coastal states.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 112-398 to strike Section 17304, relating to oil and gas lease sales in the Southern California planning area, and part 4, relating to OCS revenue sharing with coastal states.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Capps amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 267 (Roll no. 60).
